TestCase.name: testThreeOr
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, d FROM MyTable1, MyTable2 WHERE (b = e AND a = 0) OR ((a = 1 AND d = 2) OR (a = 2 AND d = 1))

LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(AND(=($1, $4), =($0, 0)), AND(=($0, 1), =($3, 2)), AND(=($0, 2), =($3, 1)))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(OR(AND(=($1, $4), =($0, 0)), AND(=($0, 1), =($3, 2)), AND(=($0, 2), =($3, 1))), OR(=(0, $0), =(1, $0), =(2, $0)))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

TestCase.name: testAnd
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, d FROM MyTable1, MyTable2 WHERE b = e AND ((a = 1 AND d = 2) OR (a = 2 AND d = 1))

LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(=($1, $4), OR(AND(=($0, 1), =($3, 2)), AND(=($0, 2), =($3, 1))))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(=($1, $4), OR(AND(=($0, 1), =($3, 2)), AND(=($0, 2), =($3, 1))), OR(=(1, $0), =(2, $0)), OR(=(2, $3), =(1, $3)))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

TestCase.name: testCanNotMatchThisRule
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, d FROM MyTable1, MyTable2 WHERE b = e OR ((a = 1 AND d = 2) OR (a = 2 AND d = 1))

LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(=($1, $4), AND(=($0, 1), =($3, 2)), AND(=($0, 2), =($3, 1)))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[OR(=($1, $4), AND(=($0, 1), =($3, 2)), AND(=($0, 2), =($3, 1)))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

TestCase.name: testMultiFields
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, d FROM MyTable1, MyTable2 WHERE (a = 1 AND b = 1 AND d = 2 AND e = 2) OR (a = 2 AND b = 2 AND d = 1 AND e = 1)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(AND(=($0, 1), =($1, 1), =($3, 2), =($4, 2)), AND(=($0, 2), =($1, 2), =($3, 1), =($4, 1)))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(OR(AND(=($0, 1), =($1, 1), =($3, 2), =($4, 2)), AND(=($0, 2), =($1, 2), =($3, 1), =($4, 1))), OR(AND(=(1, $0), =(1, $1)), AND(=(2, $0), =(2, $1))), OR(AND(=(2, $3), =(2, $4)), AND(=(1, $3), =(1, $4))))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

TestCase.name: testAndOr
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, d FROM MyTable1, MyTable2 WHERE ((a = 1 AND d = 2) OR (a = 2 AND d = 1)) AND ((a = 3 AND d = 4) OR (a = 4 AND d = 3))

LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[AND(OR(AND(=($0, 1), =($3, 2)), AND(=($0, 2), =($3, 1))), OR(AND(=($0, 3), =($3, 4)), AND(=($0, 4), =($3, 3))))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(OR(AND(=($0, 1), =($3, 2)), AND(=($0, 2), =($3, 1))), OR(AND(=($0, 3), =($3, 4)), AND(=($0, 4), =($3, 3))), OR(=(1, $0), =(2, $0)), OR(=(2, $3), =(1, $3)), OR(=(3, $0), =(4, $0)), OR(=(4, $3), =(3, $3)))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

TestCase.name: testMultiJoins
TestCase.Resource: SELECT T1.a, T2.d FROM MyTable1 T1, (SELECT * FROM MyTable1, MyTable2 WHERE a = d) T2 WHERE (T1.a = 1 AND T1.b = 1 AND T2.a = 2 AND T2.e = 2) OR (T1.a = 2 AND T2.b = 2 AND T2.d = 1 AND T2.e = 1)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$6]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(AND(=($0, 1), =($1, 1), =($3, 2), =($7, 2)), AND(=($0, 2), =($4, 2), =($6, 1), =($7, 1)))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5], g=[$6], h=[$7]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($0, $3)]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$6]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(OR(AND(=($0, 1), =($1, 1), =($3, 2), =($7, 2)), AND(=($0, 2), =($4, 2), =($6, 1), =($7, 1))), OR(AND(=(1, $0), =(1, $1)), =(2, $0)), OR(AND(=(2, $3), =(2, $7)), AND(=(2, $4), =(1, $6), =(1, $7))))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], d=[$3], e=[$4], f=[$5], g=[$6], h=[$7]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $3)], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

TestCase.name: testMultiSingleSideFields
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, d FROM MyTable1, MyTable2 WHERE (a = 1 AND b = 1 AND d = 2 AND e = 2) OR (d = 1 AND e = 1)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(AND(=($0, 1), =($1, 1), =($3, 2), =($4, 2)), AND(=($3, 1), =($4, 1)))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(OR(AND(=($0, 1), =($1, 1), =($3, 2), =($4, 2)), AND(=($3, 1), =($4, 1))), OR(AND(=(2, $3), =(2, $4)), AND(=(1, $3), =(1, $4))))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

TestCase.name: testSimple
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, d FROM MyTable1, MyTable2 WHERE (a = 1 AND d = 2) OR (a = 2 AND d = 1)

LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[OR(AND(=($0, 1), =($3, 2)), AND(=($0, 2), =($3, 1)))]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[true], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])

LogicalProject(a=[$0], d=[$3]) +- LogicalJoin(condition=[AND(OR(AND(=($0, 1), =($3, 2)), AND(=($0, 2), =($3, 1))), OR(=(1, $0), =(2, $0)), OR(=(2, $3), =(1, $3)))], joinType=[inner]) :- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable1, source: [TestTableSource(a, b, c)]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable2, source: [TestTableSource(d, e, f, g, h)]]])
